Version.note: Added support for dynamic templates
Added SortOrder and set it to 1000 for all ItemTemplates that didn't already have a SortOrder element
Added xUnit test project
Added Project Template - Razor v3 Web Application
Added Project Template - AngularJS And Web API - Empty
Updated Project Template - Added missing files for Durandal451 project template per issue #256
Added Item Template - Added basic and expanded Gulp configuration files
Added Item Template - Bower manifest file
Added Item Template - AngularJS Filter
Updated Item Template - Simplified Template Reference to automatically to add TemplateBuilder NuGet package to the SideWaffle Project Template Files item template
Changed the Web Templates Definition files to resolve a conflict with the Add Class context menu option issue #251
Chrome extension: Updated JavaScript IntelliSense for the Chrome API
Added Item Template - Docker file for ASP.NET 5
Added Item Template - AngularJS Provider
Updated Item Template - AngularJS TypeScript templates updated to be Typescript 1.0 and Angular 1.3 compatible
Updated Item Templates - AngularJS TypeScript templates updated to more closely match the AngularJs JavaScript templates, and to follow best practices
Added Item Template - AngularJs TypeScript Service file
Chrome templates: Copy files only when 'Copy to Output Directory' is set
Chrome templates: Copy files from scripts folder, not only app
Chrome templates: Added unpacked folder for the Chrome extensions to make debugging easier
Added Item Template - Angular Template for adding an Angular Module
Added Item Template - Angular Template for adding an Angular Test Specification
Added Item Template - AngularJs Service: minification ready with starter dependencies. By John Papa, http://johnpapa.net
Added Item Template - AngularJs Service: minification ready with starter dependencies. By John Papa, http://johnpapa.net
Added Item Template - AngularJs Service: minification ready with starter dependencies. By John Papa, http://johnpapa.net
Added Item Template - AngularJs Test Spec
Added Item Template - WEIgnore Ignore File (.weignore)
Added Item Template - Empty AppVeyor.yml file
Added Item Template - Full AppVeyor.yml file for appveyor.com
Added Item Template - JSCS Rules File (.jscsrc)
Added Item Template - PowerShell Empty PowerShell file
Added Item Template - PowerShell Cmdlet (advanced function)
Added Item Template - PowerShell Cmdlet (advanced function) complete
Added Item Template - PowerShell DSC Configuration (simple)
Added Item Template - PowerShell DSC Resource provider
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Adds a faked method return from a fake
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Asserts that a call to a method must have happened one or more times
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Asserts that a call to a method must have happened exactly once
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Asserts that a call to a method must have happened exactly a number of times
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Asserts that a call to a method must have happened exactly twice
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Asserts that a call to a method never have happened
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Adds a fake to a unit test
Added Snippet - FakeItEasy Adds a strict fake to a unit test
Updated Angular snippets
